alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Chickasaw, southern Itawamba and northern Monroe Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fulton to Amory to near Houston. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Fulton, Houston, Okolona, Smithville, Tremont, New Salem, New Wren, Trebloc, Evergreen, Clay, Hatley, Abney, Quincy, Turon, Egypt, Wren, McCondy and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
